remarks: Rearrangement of 4 terms in a subtraction.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
negidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
pncand.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
subaddd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
addsub4d.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
sub4d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A - B ) - ( C - D ) ) = ( ( A - C ) - ( B - D ) ) ) $.
